title: Kingdom Hearts III + Re Mind DLC
body:
Kingdom Hearts III + Re Mind DLC


Genres/Tags: RPG, Action RPG, Beat ’em up (Brawler), 3D
Company: Square Enix
Languages: ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 65.3 GB
Repack Size: from 35.9 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Kingdom.Hearts.III.and.Re.Mind-CODEX ISO release: codex-kingdom.hearts.iii.and.re.mind.iso (70,113,951,774 bytes)
  • Kingdom.Hearts.III.and.Re.Mind.Network.Fix-CODEX (47 MB) applied over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of Japanese/Asian videos and voiceovers. No, in my repack absence of those files doesn’t break DLC menu, it’s always available (but without completing the game one time Re Mind won’t be available in there, only Slideshow)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 65.3 to 35.9/53.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 10-30 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 66 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • To make the game working under Windows 7 and 8.1 delete the following file after installation: “KINGDOM HEARTS III\Binaries\Win64\dbghelp.dll”
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Sora is joined by Donald Duck and Goofy, two emissaries sent by King Mickey from Disney Castle, to stop an evil force known as the Heartless from invading and overtaking the universe. Through the power of positivity and friendship, Sora, Donald and Goofy unite with iconic Disney-Pixar characters old and new to prevail tremendous challenges and persevere against the darkness threatening their worlds.

Also includes Re Mind – the other tale that unfolded during the climax of KINGDOM HEARTS III. In this additional chapter, Sora travels to the Keyblade Graveyard determined to rescue Kairi and discovers truths that he never before imagined.

Game Features

  • Exclusive new “Element Encoder” Keyblade with purchase
  • Adventure in Disney and Pixar Worlds
  • Unlock the Power of the Keyblades
  • Relive Classic Disney Shorts Through Minigames
  • Includes Re Mind (DLC)
